rows.title: Why do we need to be clean?

title.eng: Why do we need to be clean?

text.eng: Clean bodies keep us healthy and free from disease. Be sure to wash your face and all your other body parts with soap. You will feel great after!

rows.text: Clean bodies keep us healthy and free from disease. Be sure to wash your face and all your other body parts with soap. You will feel great after!

rows.title: Importance of bathing and washing

text.eng: It is important to use clean water to wash our bodies and faces so we don't get diseases like trachoma (which can lead to blindness).

rows.title: Tips for a clean bathroom

text.eng:
* Sweep your bathroom, the area around it and pathway to it daily.
* Use soap to get rid of any stains on the floor if you can.
* Check your bathroom regularly. Make any repairs quickly.
